mapper.select: select b.boa_snum boa_snum, b.boa_imgpng boa_imgpng, b.boa_subject boa_subject, b.boa_context boa_context, b.boa_regdate boa_regdate, m.mem_snum mem_snum, m.mem_id mem_id, m.mem_profile mem_profile, c.cat_name from board b, member m, categorylist c where b.mem_snum = m.mem_snum and m.mem_id = #{mem_id} and b.boa_snum = c.boa_snum order by b.boa_snum desc, b.boa_regdate desc
select c.cat_name cat_name from categorylist c, member m, board b where c.boa_snum = b.boa_snum and b.mem_snum = m.mem_snum and m.mem_id = #{mem_id } GROUP BY c.CAT_NAME

select b.boa_snum boa_snum, b.boa_imgpng boa_imgpng, b.boa_subject boa_subject, b.boa_context boa_context, b.boa_regdate boa_regdate, m.mem_snum mem_snum, m.mem_id mem_id, m.mem_profile mem_profile, c.cat_name from board b, member m, categorylist c where b.mem_snum = m.mem_snum and m.mem_id = #{mem_id} and b.boa_snum = c.boa_snum and c.cat_name = #{cat_name} order by b.boa_snum desc, b.boa_regdate desc
select cat_name from categorylist GROUP BY CAT_NAME
select boa_snum, boa_subject, boa_regdate, boa_injeong, boa_hitcnt, m.mem_snum,m.mem_id, boa_imgpng, m.mem_profile from board b, member m where boa_snum = #{boa_snum} and b.mem_snum = m.mem_snum

select c.com_snum, c.com_context, c.com_regdate, b.boa_snum, m.mem_id, m.mem_profile from board_comment c, board b, member m where b.boa_snum = #{boa_snum} and b.boa_snum = c.boa_snum and c.mem_snum = m.mem_snum order by c.com_snum desc
mapper.insert: insert into board_comment (com_snum, boa_snum, com_context, mem_snum, com_regdate) values (seq_com_snum.nextval, #{boa_snum}, #{com_context}, #{mem_snum}, sysdate)
